name: Gal*Gun VR
description: Put the VR headset on and enter a world where you are the most popular guy around! Dreams do come true! The legendary arcade-shooting game "Gal*Gun" is here in VR!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 480 Storage: 3 GB available space
